name: siphon-dev
description: Runtime context for coding agents - captures dev server output for AI assistants

scripts.build:npm: printf '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' | cat - <(bun build src/siphon.ts --target node | tail -n +2) > dist/siphon.js && printf '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' | cat - <(bun build src/siphon-mcp.ts --target node | tail -n +2) > dist/siphon-mcp.js && chmod +x dist/*.js
scripts.build:bin: bun build src/siphon.ts --compile --outfile dist/siphon && bun build src/siphon-mcp.ts --compile --outfile dist/siphon-mcp
